issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add SQL support for NATURAL JOIN
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10727](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10727). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
(We cannot do this until we have basic SQL JOIN working)

A **NATURAL JOIN** is a **JOIN** operation that creates an implicit **join** clause for you based on the common columns in the two tables being **joined**. Common columns are columns that have the same name in both tables. A **NATURAL JOIN** can be an INNER **join**, a LEFT OUTER **join**, or a RIGHT OUTER **join**. The default is INNER **join**.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10727?focusedCommentId=17332311) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
